tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Close Quarters
programme.desc: Back at JAG, Harm is flooded with cases but still wants to help out an 80-year-old veteran accused of robbery. Meanwhile, Turner takes on an assignment in a sub whose crew has rescued possible defecting North Koreans.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Posse Comitatus
programme.desc: Harm and Mac argue the case of a Marine pilot who used force to interfere with a local police matter that led to a man’s killing. Roberts is the investigating officer in the matter of a Navy doctor who is requesting conscientious objector status.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Boast
programme.desc: When an unwitting corporal boasts to a reporter that he killed an Iraqi prisoner of war, facts begin to emerge that could convict him despite his later claim that he was only lying toi mpress.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Pulse Rate
programme.desc: Harm and Mac go aboard the USS Gillcrist to determine if a seaman’s fatal accident during a routine repair was the result of a co-worker’s dereliction of duty or worse.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Good Intentions
programme.desc: Mac defends a petty officer and former alcoholic accused of a brutal murder after a drinking binge which renders him useless in remembering details that could help him. Roberts is entangled in the case of a Navy Commander accused of embezzling funds.(n)

programme.title: JAG: People vs SECNAV
programme.desc: After an incident in Iraq claims the lives of innocent civilians, SecNav is brought up on charges of war crimes in International Court, and Harm and Mac must defend him. Meanwhile, during a trip to the arcade, little A.J. goes missing.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crossroads
programme.desc: To protect a key witness who is en route to testifying against a deadly drug cartel, Team Scorpion takes her on the run, with the cartel hot on their heels.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Cliffhanger
programme.desc: Walter finally learns Cabe's long-kept secret regarding the Baghdad mission, and it threatens to tear Team Scorpion apart forever.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Postcards From the Edge
programme.desc: Scorpion, torn apart and uncertain about their future as a team, must come together for their most important mission yet to save Walter's life as his car teeters on the side of a cliff.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Satellite Of Love
programme.desc: The new Director of Homeland Security reunites the team when a nuclear powered Russian satellite is knocked out of orbit and must be diverted before it detonates over Southern California.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Cuba Libre
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Cuba when a woman from Cabe's past pleads for him to help catch a Serbian war criminal.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Fish Filet
programme.desc: In order to save the lives of three judges, Sylvester goes undercover in federal prison but Team Scorpion must break him out when his life is threatened. Kevin Weisman guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Chris’s addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: "Moving Day"
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, “Moving Day”, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt3
programme.desc: The third part of Yvette Fielding and the team's investigation into the very haunted and abandoned Gloucester Prison. With the team splitting up the activity rises and something is trying to stop Yvette and Glen.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads team in a violent, secret investigation. Place's name and location concealed due to extreme haunting. Little history, aggressive entities a mystery. Can they reveal the darkness and face the unknown?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT2
programme.desc: Most Haunted's deadliest investigation, Part 2. Spirits emerging, team's resolve tested as darkness envelops. Growing fear, team's safety at stake. Can they continue?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large\ncountry house. Without exception every member of the team experience something\nunexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hill View Manor
programme.desc: The TAPS team has been called out to investigate Hill View Manor in New Castle, Pennsylvania. Once a nursing facility, this now abandoned building is fraught with paranormal activity that allegedly stems from the violent deaths of former patients.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Home Is Where the Haunt Is
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Haunt Is
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Taps heads to Beardslee Castle in Little Falls, NY, which is a hometurned into a restaurant/ bar that has lots of interesting claims.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Bat Out of Hell
programme.desc: This week TAPS heads to Thousand Island, NY to investigate a 4-acre private island and is joined by the \\" King of Rock and Roll\\" himself, Meatloaf.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Tunnels of Terror
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Lockport, New York to investigate an underworld of tunnels. It holds a mystery of possible murder, multiple deaths and frightening phenomena. What stories do the spirits of Lockport Caves want to tell?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 5
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tunnels are discovered on Seefra which can be used to reach eight other Seefra planets.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When an old man is killed, Beka, Rhade and Harper are the main suspects and stand trial.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rhade leads the rebels in battle against a warlord on Seefra-5.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan discovers that Beka's boyfriend was really Drago Musevini, and he used Beka's DNA to create the Nietzscheans.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Rhade find a test that will either grant them great wealth or drive them to madness.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Harper discovers a program that can destroy eight of the Seefra planets, killing millions.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.85
programme.desc: Two men sue former friends for having them falsely arrested for assault and for making terrorist threats/A woman claims she threw a lawn chair at two men in self-defense; she and her husband sue them for alleged threats and moneyowed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.38
programme.desc: Man's jaw broken at party, misses Thanksgiving dinner, sues assailant/Woman sues ex for TV value, unpaid phone bill; he claims TV sold to unreachable friend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.123
programme.desc: Navy woman unaware of boyfriend's girlfriend loans $3,000 for car rims; man admits drunken stupor caused furniture damage.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.171
programme.desc: Teen sustains broken eye socket in black sweatshirt altercation; accused claims self-defense. Man aids son with financial aid post-back injury, demands repayment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.182
programme.desc: A brutal catfight ensues after a teenager gossips about infidelities between her brother and her best girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.35
programme.desc: Man spends life savings to bring children to US, they sue each other over car insurance and repossession/Single mothers move in together, dispute unpaid rent, utility bills, and alleged house damage.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.51
programme.desc: Young nurse sues ex-boyfriend for damages, Dodge Durango payments, motorcycle damages, and unpaid cell phone charges/Woman sues evicted friend and child for back rent, countersued for belongings left behind.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.6
programme.desc: Teen catfight leads to adult feud over truck vandalism/Teen crashes car after drunk 17-year-old allegedly permits him, sued by her father.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.203
programme.desc: A Malibu man claiming he was tired of being a “cabana boy” for his older girlfriend is sued for allegedly stealing her tools and making unauthorized charges on her credit card.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.236
programme.desc: Ex-fiancés from rehab fight publicly and clash in court over an arrest, property return, and a dog. A 19-year-old sues her mother for spending a dog bite settlement check.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.235
programme.desc: A woman sues her sister's ex for repossessing a Chevy Yukon; he alleges stolen tags. Exes argue over a bite mark and sue for car damages, a lease, and unpaid vet bills.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Wolfgang Puck judges the teams five dishes before moving on to evening service where they will be cooking for servicemen from the US Coast Guard.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The challenge set for the contestants involves making a dessert which could be served at a romantic dinner.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The losers of the blind taste test challange must peel grapes by hand for the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants visit BLT Steak, where the winner will be working. Back at Hell's Kitchen, the team which produces the best food receives a trip to Venice Beach, while the losers have to go back to the kitchen to perform prep work.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must cook three dishes each requiring a progressively shorter amount of time with the prize being a shopping trip.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fix-Ups and Downs
programme.desc: Jennifer and Audrey practice their match-making skills and inadvertently end up date-less while Adam and Jeff score financial gain in the process. Meanwhile, Russell tries a new tactic at 'fixing himself up.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay
programme.desc: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about 'art'. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey find themselves enjoying alternative forms of entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share
programme.desc: Jeff makes plans to take Audrey away for the weekend to a fancy hotel, even though they’ll have to sit through a time share presentation to get a great deal.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male
programme.desc: Jeff's drive to be labeled an 'optimal male' on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior, while Adam's over-friendliness with an ex-girlfriend unsettles Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All Grown Up
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different than the all girls private school she attended.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fight Like A Girl
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team Baby Lyssa decides she will step-up in this hunt.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Higher Power
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission - convince Duane Lee to meet with him.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Who's the Boss
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a run away fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie's Number Two
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interviews her cousin, JD. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si spends the day over at Phil and Kay's, Jep stops by with the kids to keep them away from Jessica, who has taken ill.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Life of Si
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.(n)

programme.title: Frank Herbert's Dune: Episode 3
programme.desc: Paul Atreides, who has become known as Paul Muad'Dib, leads a rebellion against the Harkonnen, who have the secret support of the emperor.(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.(n)

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.(n)

programme.title: Robot Apocalypse
programme.desc: When expert hacker Tara tries to stop a powerful, sentient A.I. as it takes over the world's military, the A.I. marks her as a terrorist.(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Two highly skilled martial arts warriors must train an American teen so that he is able to fight a centuries old battle to free the Monkey King.(n)

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.(n)

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A scientist becomes obsessed with bringing back his family members who died in a traffic accident.(n)

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: A team of scientists are gathered to prevent a global catastrophe. But one of the scientists realizes early on that the cause of volcanic reactions is most likely due to a secret government operation investigating alternative energy resources.(n)

programme.title: The Big Fight
programme.desc: Tien Peng and Cheung Ching-ching play the leaders of a rebel group of Chinese kung fu fighters in a Japanese occupied town at the height of the war.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.(n)

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: When Nathan (Taylor Lautner) discovers the parents who raised him aren't his real folks, he begins to uncover unsettling secrets that trigger events and leave him running for his life.(n)

programme.title: A Beauty And The Beast Christmas
programme.desc: Social Media influencer Ginger Holiday is convinced by her agent to fake a romance with viral bad boy Beau Bradley to gain more followers. Initially they can't stand each other but the feelings they had to fake might just be turning into something real.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Harmony
programme.desc: Harmony's pop star boyfriend breaks up with her right before the holiday season, but when she returns to her hometown she discovers the heart and music that her life has been missing.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: Starring Matthew Knight and Chris Kattan. Three children and their father move from California to Canada. When they go shopping at the mall, they find counterfeit cash, inadvertently help catch crooks, and make a discovery about Santa.(n)

programme.title: French Silk
programme.desc: In steamy New Orleans, a police detective doesn't know whether to arrest his prime suspect or make love to her after he unexpectedly finds himself in a passionate affair with an accused killer.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: All Around The Town
programme.desc: An innocent girl is kidnapped and held hostage for two years causing her to develop multiple personalities and making her the number one suspect when her English professor is brutally murdered.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.desc: Having the winning lottery jackpot ticket is the best thing that could have happened to delivery man Bill Regan. Determined to find out what happened, a friend retraces Bill's delivery stops and discovers they lead to her own husband.(n)

programme.title: The Prince and Me
programme.desc: A premedical student (Julia Stiles) falls in love with a Danish prince (Luke Mably) who keeps his identity a secret.(n)

programme.title: Sing Street
programme.desc: In 1985, a Dublin teenager (Ferdia Walsh-Peelo) forms a rock 'n' roll band to win the heart of an aspiring model (Lucy Boynton).(n)

programme.title: A Royal Night Out
programme.desc: As Europe celebrates V-E Day in 1945, teenage princesses Elizabeth II (Sarah Gadon) and Margaret (Bel Powley) spend a wild evening in London.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: After warning them of the dangers of the city, two traildrivers are shanghaied shortly after the Ponderosa cattle herd arrives in San Francisco.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Virginia City is overrun by criminals in the form of a protection racket. Citizens must pay or they'll suffer an "accident".(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The son of a rancher is trying to sell land for mining, the Cartwrights fear this could jeopardise a standing agreement.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: A boy's mother dies and father is in prison, the Cartwrights step in to look after the boy until the uncle comes to claim him.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: A former dance hall girl poses as a Spanish heiress to claim a land grant, the Cartwrights try to fight the claim.(n)

programme.title: Moondance Alexander
programme.desc: When a Pinto pony named Checkers leaps into her life, Moondance is convinced that Checkers has champion potential and enters him in the Bow Valley Classic. She soon learns that only perseverance lands you in the winner's circle.(n)

programme.title: The Lost Medallion
programme.desc: Billy Stone and Allie, two 13-year-old friends, uncover a long-lost medallion and accidentally wish themselves back in time. In order for Billy to save Allie's life, he must give up the medallion to the evil warlord, Cobra, who rules the island.(n)

programme.title: Time Toys
programme.desc: A group of kids stumble upon a chest full of toys from the future. The discovery takes them on an adventure using their new-found toys to save their neighbourhood and the world from a maniacal madman. A fun, futuristic adventure for all the family.(n)

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 1
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.(n)

programme.title: Keep The Aspidistra Flying
programme.desc: When successful advertiser, Gordon Comstock (Richard E. Grant), abruptly walks away from his career to pursue his dream of being a poet, his path is much more difficult than expected and soon financial problems begin to pile up.(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a call-girl-turned-actress and works to help her advance her career, but things get a little more complicated than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: You Stupid Man
programme.desc: A writer struggles to deal with the break-up with his girlfriend. It does not help with getting her out of his mind that she recently became a famous TV start.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
programme.desc: A quiet tenant at a London boarding house is suspected of being Jack the Ripper in Alfred Hitchcock's silent classic.(n)

programme.title: Sapphire
programme.desc: In 1950s London racial hostility to Commonwealth immigrants is openly paraded. Scotland Yard detectives probe the racially motivated murder of a young woman.(n)

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A baby sitter is terrorised by a homicidal maniac who's escaped from a mental institution to kill his ex-wife.(n)

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: A history of inherited insanity spells trouble for a 19th-century nobleman suspected of a series of grisly murders.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: As Hurricane Camille threatens the Mississippi Gulf area, Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a deputy sheriff evacuating the residents, aided by a Red Cross nurse (Marilyn Jones). With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) is horrified when he realizes he has leaped into the Ku Klux Klan, but then finds his salvation as an infiltrator who must break up a plot to hang a young black man (Michael Beach). Noble Willingham guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a trendy Beverly Hills hairstylist who must set aside the scissors to save a murder witness's (Joseph Gordon) life. With Dean Stockwell, Doran Clark.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) experiences the anguishing aftermath of rape after he leaps into the life of the victim (Cheryl Pollak), and it intensifies when he takes the accused rapist (Matthew Sheehan) to court.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) descends into a lower life form as he leaps into the body of a chimpanzee that is part of an interspecies communication experiment and a candidate for space travel. Caroline Goodall guest stars. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Biocrime (REDUX)
programme.desc: Travis is hired to apprehend Father Abode, a former student of Dr. Novak, who has been producing genetic mutants for the sexual pleasure of wealthy clients. The chase reveals dark information about Marcus's past.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Nothing But the Truth
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are reunited with Stewie Harper in the search for the Chalice of Truth in France.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Paris, France after the Sword of Jacques de Molay, Grand Master of the Knights Templar. Rival relic hunter Rita Rosellini is also after the sword.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Possessed
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Brussels, Belgium in search of the sacred sundial of Zeus in order to stop the Vampires.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Memories of Montmartre
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Paris, France to find a stolen locket, so they can clear Sydney's dead grandmother of the charges.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Put Back
programme.desc: Kuba, Africa 100 AD: Worshippers of Woote curse his idol to protect it. 2000: Ross Crawford comes to Sydney, because he took the idol and the curse has accelerated his aging.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Jersey Score
programme.desc: Ton & Allen attend a silent auction in NJ, but that doesn't stop the local buyers from letting them know they're not welcome! They uncover a skeet throwing machine from the 1960's & a vintage vehicle with some real horsepower!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.(n)
